DataElement.preferredName: Substance use Unmet Treatment Need Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Consumption of medicine, drugs, or other materials including prescription, over-the-counter, or street drugs; alcohol; and tobacco._A need or request that was not fulfilled._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._Anything that is necessary but lacking; the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.
